<a id="AudioEffectLimiter"></a>

# AudioEffectLimiter

**Deprecated:** Use [AudioEffectHardLimiter](AudioEffectHardLimiter.md) instead.

**Inherits:** [AudioEffect](AudioEffect.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Adds a soft-clip limiter audio effect to an Audio bus.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A limiter is similar to a compressor, but it's less flexible and designed to disallow sound going over a given dB threshold. Adding one in the Master bus is always recommended to reduce the effects of clipping.

Soft clipping starts to reduce the peaks a little below the threshold level and progressively increases its effect as the input level increases such that the threshold is never exceeded.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Audio buses](../tutorials/audio/audio_buses.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="AudioEffectLimiter_property_ceiling_db"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **ceiling_db** = `-0.1` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectLimiter_property_ceiling_db)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_ceiling_db**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_ceiling_db**\ (\ )

The waveform's maximum allowed value, in decibels. Value can range from -20 to -0.1.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectLimiter_property_soft_clip_db"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **soft_clip_db** = `2.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectLimiter_property_soft_clip_db)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_soft_clip_db**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_soft_clip_db**\ (\ )

Applies a gain to the limited waves, in decibels. Value can range from 0 to 6.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectLimiter_property_threshold_db"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **threshold_db** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectLimiter_property_threshold_db)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_threshold_db**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_threshold_db**\ (\ )

Threshold from which the limiter begins to be active, in decibels. Value can range from -30 to 0.
